name: Dhawan Sanitary
overview:
Dhawan Sanitary Udyog has been the leading manufacturing and supplying company for Fancy C. P. Bathroom Fittings & Accessories under the brand name “PRIMA”. The company has been developing and manufacturing quality products associated with technology & aesthetic appeal since year 1991.

Instructions For Proper Handling: Our PRIMA brand ISI marked Bathroom Fittings are manufactured from superior quality corrosion resistant raw materials passing BIS Standards. Chroming on the Fittings also conforms to BIS Norms & Standards. As our own body needs proper care from time to time for our better health & good looks, these fancy bathroom fittings also need proper care during their daily use. Water generally contains certain salts which are harmful for the metal as well as chrome/ nickel plating on the bathroom fittings.

Infrastructure: Our sophisticated manufacturing division is set up over an area of 7,000 sq feet and is equipped with hi-tech machines and facilities. Our manufacturing division is supported by certain hand tools and machines that assist us in the speedy and streamlined fabrication of our range of bathroom fittings & accessories.

Our Team: Our unswerving commitment to provide quality and innovation in our range of designer basin mixers, associated fittings and accessories is realized through our efficient team. We are backed by a team of proficient personnel that is dedicated towards meeting the aesthetic tastes of our clients.

Quality: For ensuring optimum quality of our range of designer basin mixers, associated fittings and accessories, we have adopted a set of quality norms for manufacturing. Our quality inspectors and experts in the domain undertake stringent quality tests based on these norms and ensure that our designer basin mixers, associated fittings and accessories are free from any defects.

Our Products: Bathroom Accessories Showers Shower Accessories Self Closing Taps Health Faucet & Jet Sprays
